name: DailyPoetARelaxingPoemPoetryFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The Daily Poet presents a new poem every day from poetry of all kinds. Set to relaxing music and read by a human voice, it is perfect for your morning or nightly routines.

This flash briefing is less than a minute long and runs 7 days a week.

Visit @thepoetdaily on Instagram for visual accompaniment and further reading for each poem.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
